description: The Tree House is a new pavilion commissioned by Lendlease. It contains a kiosk, public WCs, a viewing terrace, and a multifunctional public space. The building is focused on embracing nature and merging with the mature existing landscape.

factsheet.heading: Self Guided Walking Tour
paragraphs: Enjoy a self-guided audio tour narrated by the project architect as they walk you through Elephant  Park toward The Tree House. Learn valuable insights into the build, exploring the considerations and key decisions made by the project team all available at your own pace.
To download more information about the pavilion, including the audio file, and the transcript of the recording visit: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/uz7d3rfor0bv7kc/AAC9ZNzlgrHez7wC6_--wCmCa?dl=0

**Please note, as this is a self-guided tour, there will be no one to guide you at the pavilion. You are not bound to the time of the drop-in event; you may download the files and visit the pavilion at a time convenient to you.
Please use the booking feature, so we may send you the materials.

name: The Tree House- A Walk in the Park with Bell Phillips Architects
